entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
